q: What flood risks does Naples face?
a: Naples lies in FEMA Zone AE with surge potential over 5 ft during Category 3 storms. Flood barriers protect openings below elevation 12 ft NAVD. View Naples installations.

q: Do Naples permits require engineering stamps?
a: Yes—all permanent barriers need Florida PE-stamped drawings referencing ASCE 24. We submit electronically to Collier County Building Review.

q: Can flood barriers protect lanai or patio doors?
a: Yes, modular systems seal sliding glass doors without drilling into track channels. Panels store flat off-season.

q: How soon can installation occur before hurricane season?
a: Survey to install averages 10–14 days. Expedite program May–Oct ensures pre-storm delivery.

q: Are Naples barriers eligible for insurance discounts?
a: Yes—NFIP Community Rating System credits up to 10 % when devices meet dry-floodproofing criteria. Provide our certificate to your insurer.
